NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.subtitle: This page doesn’t exist, has been removed, or is private.

hero.subtitle: Build weekly meal plans, create shopping lists, and get AI nutrition insights based on your goals, preferences, and routine.
hero.badge: Meal Planning That Fits Real Life

features.title: Everything You Need to Plan Better Meals
features.subtitle: From planning to tracking, Nutra helps you decide what to eat and why.

weeklyMealPlan.title: Weekly Meal Plan
weeklyMealPlan.copy: Get a weekly plan built around your goals, dietary needs, and schedule.

shoppingList.title: Shopping List
shoppingList.copy: Turn your plan into a ready-to-shop list so you buy what you need and waste less.

mealAnalysis.title: Recipes
mealAnalysis.copy: Log meals and instantly see calories and macros to stay on track.

aiSuggestions.title: AI Suggestions
aiSuggestions.copy: Ask AI for better swaps and balanced meal ideas when cravings hit.

createShareRecipes.title: Create & Share Recipes
createShareRecipes.copy: Create your own recipes, publish them, and share them with friends, family, or your coach.

pricing.title: Pick the Plan That Fits Your Goals
pricing.subtitle: Start free, then upgrade when you want deeper AI guidance.

perks.priorityAiFeatures: Early access to new AI features

finalCta.title: Build Better Nutrition Habits
finalCta.subtitle: Plan meals you can stick to, shop with less stress, and make smarter food choices every day with Nutra.

footer.description: Nutra helps you plan, track, and improve your nutrition with practical daily tools.
footer.builtWith: Built with love and ton of coffee

recipePreview.title: Publish your recipe and share it with anyone
recipePreview.subtitle: Create your own recipe in Nutra, share it with a link, and let others view ingredients, nutrition, and step-by-step cooking instructions.
recipePreview.fallbackSubtitle: Open this recipe page to view ingredients, nutrition, and cooking steps.

howItWorks.title: Build your meal routine in three simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Set your goals once, then follow a clear weekly plan with shopping and tracking built in.

waitlist.title: Join the Nutra Waitlist
waitlist.subtitle: Get early access to new features, exclusive nutrition tips, and launch updates. Join our growing community today.
waitlist.invalidEmailMessage: Please enter a valid email address.
waitlist.genericErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
waitlist.rateLimitMessage: You can submit up to 2 emails every 10 minutes. Please try again later.
